statements: SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_sites;
SELECT site_name, disposal_date FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_sites;
SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_sites WHERE proximity_to_community > 0.5;
SELECT site_id, location FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_sites WHERE disposal_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT site_name, proximity_to_community FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_sites ORDER BY proximity_to_community DESC;
SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_sites ORDER BY disposal_date DESC, proximity_to_community ASC
SELECT site_name, location FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_sites WHERE proximity_to_community > 0.5
SELECT site_name, location FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_sites WHERE proximity_to_community < 0.2 AND disposal_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT site_name, location, proximity_to_community FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_sites WHERE location = POINT(50.123, 30.456)
SELECT COUNT(site_id) AS total_sites, AVG(proximity_to_community) AS avg_proximity FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_sites
SELECT * FROM Hazardous_Waste_Disposal_Sites;
SELECT site_name, location FROM Hazardous_Waste_Disposal_Sites WHERE site_id = 1;
SELECT site_name, disposal_type FROM Hazardous_Waste_Disposal_Sites ORDER BY site_name DESC;
SELECT community_name, proximity_to_site FROM Community_Proximity WHERE proximity_to_site > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM Hazardous_Waste_Disposal_Sites WHERE disposal_type = 'Landfill' ORDER BY site_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Hazardous_Waste_Disposal_Sites WHERE location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT site_name, disposal_type FROM Hazardous_Waste_Disposal_Sites WHERE site_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT community_name, proximity_to_site FROM Community_Proximity WHERE proximity_to_site > 10;
SELECT site_name, location.STAsText() AS site_location FROM Hazardous_Waste_Disposal_Sites WHERE disposal_type = 'Chemical';
SELECT * FROM Hazardous_Waste_Disposal_Sites JOIN Community_Proximity ON Hazardous_Waste_Disposal_Sites.site_id = Community_Proximity.community_id;
SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_sites;
SELECT site_name, disposal_capacity FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_sites WHERE disposal_capacity > 100;
SELECT * FROM communities ORDER BY community_name ASC;
SELECT site_id, location FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_sites WHERE site_id = 3;
SELECT community_name, distance FROM communities JOIN proximity_data ON communities.community_id = proximity_data.community_id WHERE proximity_data.site_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_sites ORDER BY site_name DESC;
SELECT site_name, disposal_capacity FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_sites WHERE disposal_capacity > 1000;
SELECT site_name, location.STAsText() AS location FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_sites WHERE disposal_capacity > 5000;
SELECT community_name, distance FROM proximity_data pd JOIN communities c ON pd.community_id = c.community_id WHERE pd.distance < 10;

SELECT site_name, community_name, distance FROM proximity_data pd JOIN hazardous_waste_disposal_sites h ON pd.site_id = h.site_id JOIN communities c ON pd.community_id = c.community_id WHERE h.disposal_capacity > 2000 AND pd.distance < 5;
SELECT * FROM WasteDisposalSites;
SELECT site_name, is_hazardous FROM WasteDisposalSites;
SELECT community_name, population FROM Communities ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT * FROM ProximityData WHERE distance < 10;
SELECT site_id, community_id, distance FROM ProximityData WHERE site_id = 3;
SELECT site_id, site_name FROM WasteDisposalSites WHERE is_hazardous = true;
SELECT community_name, population FROM Communities WHERE population > 10000 ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT site_name, location_point FROM WasteDisposalSites WHERE site_id IN (SELECT site_id FROM ProximityData WHERE distance < 10);
SELECT community_name, population, community_location FROM Communities WHERE community_id IN (SELECT community_id FROM ProximityData WHERE site_id = 1);
SELECT hazard_name, risk_level FROM HazardTypes ORDER BY hazard_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_sites;
SELECT site_name, location FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_sites WHERE disposal_volume > 1000;
SELECT id, community_name FROM communities ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT disposal_site_id, community_id, distance FROM proximity_to_communities WHERE distance < 10;
SELECT waste_type FROM hazardous_waste_types WHERE waste_type LIKE 'Chemical%';
SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_sites WHERE disposal_volume > 1000 ORDER BY site_name DESC
SELECT site_name, location FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_sites WHERE disposal_volume BETWEEN 500 AND 1000
SELECT * FROM communities c JOIN proximity_to_communities p ON c.id = p.community_id WHERE p.distance < 50 ORDER BY c.population DESC

SELECT site_name, SUM(volume_disposed) AS total_volume_disposed FROM hazardous_waste_disposal_sites s JOIN waste_disposal_history h ON s.id = h.disposal_site_id GROUP BY site_name HAVING total_volume_disposed > 5000 ORDER BY total_volume_disposed DESC

SELECT community_name, COUNT(*) AS disposal_sites_count FROM communities c JOIN proximity_to_communities p ON c.id = p.community_id GROUP BY community_name HAVING disposal_sites_count >= 3 ORDER BY disposal_sites_count DESC
